gapAnalysis.description: Upload a client's current insurance policy document (PDF, PNG, or JPG) to automatically extract key information and analyze it for potential coverage gaps.
gapAnalysis.dragDrop: Drag & drop your file here, or
gapAnalysis.userNeedsPlaceholder: e.g., 'The client recently bought a new car and is concerned about coverage for their teenage driver. They also have expensive jewelry they want to ensure is covered.'

socialComposer.title: Social Post Composer
socialComposer.placeholder: What's on your mind? Use a template or start typing...
socialComposer.leadCaptureLinkSuccess: Post published! Your unique lead capture link is ready.
socialComposer.errorFutureDate: Schedule date must be in the future.

templates.title: New Policy Announcement
templates.content: Excited to offer new [Policy Type] policies! Protect what matters most. Contact me for a free quote today! #Insurance #[YourCity]Insurance

templates.title: Seasonal Reminder (Home)
templates.content: Winter is coming! ❄️ Is your home ready? Let's review your home insurance to make sure you're covered for seasonal risks. #HomeInsurance #WinterPrep

templates.title: Promotional Offer
templates.content: Get a 10% discount when you bundle your auto and home insurance! Offer ends this month. DM me for details. #InsuranceDeals #SaveMoney

errors.title: Error
errors.POST_FAILED_message: Failed to publish post to {platform}. An unknown error occurred.
errors.POST_FAILED_guidance: Please try publishing the post again. If the problem persists, check the platform's status page.
errors.AUTH_ERROR_message: Authentication failed for {platform}. Your access token may have expired.
errors.AUTH_ERROR_guidance: Please go to Settings and reconnect your {platform} account to refresh your credentials.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_message: You've posted too frequently to {platform}. The platform has temporarily limited your activity.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_guidance: Please wait a few minutes before trying to post again.
errors.UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE_message: The action you're trying to perform is not supported by {platform}'s API.
errors.UNSUPPORTED_FEATURE_guidance: For example, scheduling posts to Instagram Stories is not possible via third-party tools. Please try a different action.
errors.NOT_CONNECTED_guidance: Please go to Settings to connect your account before posting.

leadCapture.thankYouMessage: Your request has been received. We will be in touch soon.
